description.value:
Tabaxi communities are small and remote. Sustained by hunting, crafting, and trading, members of these communities value artists and storytellers —whether their stories be true or not.

Tabaxi Art. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.R0B64NXw7yI8H051]{Tabaxi Art} You have proficiency with one of the following tools of your choice: calligrapher's supplies, a musical instrument, smith's tools, and woodcarver's tools.

Storytelling. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.MJlpdAwquWQ40hFJ]{Storytelling} You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Deception, Performance, and Persuasion.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
